name: DER-RJ - Departamento de Estradas e Rodagens do Rio de Janeiro Reviews

review.title: “Great Experience”
review.pros: Pros – Fun work experience and an opportunity to learn.Team work is emphasized which makes daily challenges easier.This job has prepared me well for future challenges and additional government roles.
review.cons: Cons – The stability of a solid pay check means you forgo the larger compensation one could have by taking on more risk.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep the team atmosphere alive. Continue down the collaborative path even if there are detractors. Organic growth appears to be superior to inorganic growth in our business.
